vote.text: Amendment SA 1395 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1395 proposed by Senator Bingaman for Senator Lautenberg. (consideration: CR S9941-9942; text: CR S9942) Of a clarifying nature.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1395 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
